title: The Irresistible Shadow (1R252)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert a [Sauron] Orc. Plays to your support area. If you can spot 5 burdens and the Free Peoples player has no cards in his or her draw deck, the Ring-bearer is corrupted.
Lore:	“Once more the desire to slip on the Ring came over Frodo; but this time it was stronger than before.”
Rarity:	R
